extensionDescription.message: Preview links, images, or search selected text in a popup window.

closeWhenFocusedInitialWindow.message: Close popup when origin window is focused

tryOpenAtMousePosition.message: Try to open at mouse position (disabled — open at screen center)

disabledUrls.message: Disable on these URLs (via plain text, regex, wildcarks, one per line)

sendPageBack.message: Send Page Back to Original Window

blurEnabled.message: Set blur effect on Original Window when popup

enableContainerIdentify.message: Keep open in the same container as original page

modifiedKey.message: Response when selected key is pressing (Please test to ensure it meets expectations.)

rememberPopupSizeAndPosition.message: Persist popup size and position(just click/scroll on popup window to save), ignoring below settings

closedByEsc.message: Press Esc to close the current popup page (overrides page's default Esc behavior)

dragPx.message: At least move px (do not check if 0):

urlCheck.message: Open directly if selected is url

doubleTapKeyToSendPageBack.message: Double tap on specific key to send page back to original window (Please check if it works as expected.)

hoverDisabledUrls.message: Disable on these URLs (via plain text, regex, wildcarks, one per line)

triggerAfterDragRelease.message: Trigger after drag is released. (no directions check if uncheck)

dragStartEnable.message: Drag triggers immediately without waiting for release. (Direction detection is not supported)

previewModeDisabledUrls.message: Disable on these URLs via plain text, regex, wildcarks, one per line.

previewModeEnable.message: Clicking on the link to preview (disable - ignore below options)

doubleClickToSwitch.message: Double-click outside images/links to toggle. Status displays on add-on icon on toolbar.

doubleClickAsClick.message: Double-click to single-click: Often used for flipping pages, switching tags, and works better with link indicators. Applies only to links.

rememberPopupSizeAndPositionForDomain.message: Dynamic Popup: remember the last popup window size and position for each domain.

note.message: The priority of size/position: domain-specific > non-domain-specific > centered/near mouse.

collectionEnable.message: Hover to reveal the button for adding the link to your collection. Press Ctrl/Command + U or click the add-on icon to view your collection.

holdToPreview.message: Hold the left mouse button to preview

linkDisabledUrls.message: Disable pop-ups for the following URLs, one rule per line, supports regular expressions, wildcards, and plain text.
